title: Zoom on over for a look at our great 2 bed, 2.5 bath! 1337 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['The Park At East Ponce', 'RENT:', '$1606 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '1337 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '2', 'BATHROOMS:', '2.5', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '❖ Breakfast Bar', '❖ Cable Ready', '❖ Carpet', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Cozy Fireplaces', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Disposal', '❖ Island Kitchens', '❖ Patio/Balcony', '❖ Range w/Oven', '❖ Air Conditioning', '❖ Custom Cabinetry', '❖ Hardwood Flooring', '❖ Individual Climate Control', '❖ Newly Renovated Apartments', '❖ Roommate Floor Plans', '❖ Townhomes Available', '❖ Trash Compactor', '❖ Washer & Dryer Connections', '❖ Window Coverings', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by The Park at East Ponce Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '❖ Accepts Credit Card Payments', '❖ Accepts Electronic Payments', '❖ Activity Court', '❖ Conference Room', '❖ Courtyard', '❖ Outdoor Grill', '❖ Pet Friendly', '❖ Planned Community Activities', '❖ Playground', '❖ Storage Space', '❖ Cardio & Fitness Center', '❖ Electronic Rent Payment', '❖ Fax/Copy Services', '❖ Green and Flowered Areas', '❖ Monthly Resident Events', '❖ Package Receiving', '❖ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '❖ Resident Referral Bonuses', '❖ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '❖ Three Clothes Care Centers', 'PET POLICY:', 'We welcome your pets for a maximum of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300.', '$15 Monthly Pet Fee.', 'Weight limit is 50 lbs.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more information.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '1900 Tree Mountain Pkwy', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Admin Fee: $135 - Non-Refundable', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '9D79989F6AE44A7']
